You maintain a permanent psychic link to the Akashic Record, the supernatural repository of all knowledge in the multiverse. This connection allows you to access knowledge that otherwise would remain out of the grasp of regular mortal minds.

Spellcasting Tradition occult

Connection Skill Occultism

Harmony Whenever you Transfer Vitality, the target receives a psychic download from the Akashic Record and can immediately attempt a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo] action. This doesn't trigger any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when a creature uses Recall Knowledge.

Initial Epiphany You learn the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.YDkb4zUM5pJRs9SH] focus spell.

Advanced Epiphany You learn the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.4qXeaZLAtTxd5tNq] focus spell.

Greater Epiphany You learn the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.qYzqKP4Plw6jgjGL] focus spell.

Perfect Harmony You create an extradimensional memory palace that functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]. Creating a door to the demiplane takes 1 minute. The memory palace keeps the same layout each time you access it, adjustable during daily preparations. Each phantasmal minion in your memory palace functions as an akashic assistant (like those created by the akashic assistant spell).
